e: ￹`Tadamaan~ `ko~ `olah~ `no~ `Kawas~.￺God's love is great￻上帝的愛是很偉大的
￹`O~ `tadamaan~`ay~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `cingra~.￺He is a noble / high ranking person.￻他是偉大的人物
￹`Sa~`tadamaan~`en~ `ko~ `demak~.￺Make a big occasion of the thing / do it up fancy.￻願你做大事，但願你的表現特殊
￹`O~ `tadamaan~`ay~ `a~ `romi'ad~ `konini~.￺This is a special day.￻今天是很特別的日子
￹`Tadamaanay~ `ko~ `pi~`pataheka~ `nira~.￺He fixed a very special / magnificent meal for us.￻他擺上很豐富的喜宴
